Congreso de la American Historical Association (Atlanta, enero 7-10 de 2016)

25 SEP 2015 • 1 min read

Andean Studies Committee Meeting: The Expanded Andes

Conference on Latin American History

Friday, January 8, 2016: 5:00 PM-6:30 PM International Ballroom A (Atlanta Marriott Marquis, International Level) Chair: Jeremy Ravi Mumford, Brown University Panel: Nancy P. Appelbaum, Binghamton University (State University of New York) Santiago Muñoz Arbelaez, Yale University Cristina Soriano, Villanova University Comment: Peter Winn, Tufts University
